message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135. Would you be interested in that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $125. I'm willing to compromise at $140. Is that a price you'd be comfortable with?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $137.50. Is that a price you'd be willing to pay?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I was thinking more along the lines of $132.50. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're running out of time, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can meet you at $138. Would that be a price you'd be willing to pay?

I'm really close to walking away from the deal, but I'll make one last offer. I'm willing to pay $129.99 for the product. If you can meet me at that price, I'll make the deal. Otherwise, I'm buying it from John for $100.
